description_txt: stated on April 13, 2020 in in a White House briefing:
quote_txt: Says as president he has “total” authority to re-open states amid the COVID-19 pandemic.

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in an email newsletter:
quote_txt: Before COVID-19, “Iowa had one of the lowest unemployment rates in the country, and many employers were scrambling to find qualified employees to fill their job openings.”

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says there’s an 800 number you can call to track the status of your stimulus check.

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer bans buying US flags during lockdown.”

description_txt: stated on April 8, 2020 in a television interview:
quote_txt: Gov. Andrew Cuomo “was simply saying if we can share 20 percent of your excess, your non-used ventilators, to help people in other parts of the state on a voluntary basis, that would be great. Of course, there was a reaction to that, which was not positive."

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: “Everyone is only dying of coronavirus now.”

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2020 in on CNN:
quote_txt: "The president looks like he was ahead of the curve – as you know, he talks about this all the time – on shutting down travel from China."

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2020 in a blog post:
quote_txt: “Church services can’t resume until we’re all vaccinated, says Bill Gates.”

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2020 in social media posts:
quote_txt: Say televangelist Pat Robertson said some young people “are doing all kinds of unnatural things with their sex organs. When people do that, they transfer all kinds of chemicals from ladies’ private parts and that’s where I think the (corona)virus came from.”

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "It is the decision of the President," not governors, to "open up the states."

description_txt: stated on March 29, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says CEOs got advance notice of COVID, then resigned to dump stock.

description_txt: stated on March 27, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says video of body bags being dumped in a ditch shows the “situation in Italy” due to the coronavirus.

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Mass vaccination for COVID-19 in Senegal was started yesterday (4/8) and the first 7 CHILDREN who received it DIED on the spot.”

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2020 in an ABC "This Week" interview:
quote_txt: "45 nations had already moved” to enforce travel restrictions with China “before the president moved.”

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2020 in a tweet that was retweeted by President Donald Trump:
quote_txt: Says of COVID-19 that Dr. Anthony Fauci "was telling people on February 29th that there was nothing to worry about and it posed no threat to the US public at large."

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Suggests Trump urged sick people to get out and vote during COVID-19 pandemic

description_txt: stated on April 8, 2020 in an op-ed published in The Guardian:
quote_txt: “It has been estimated that only 12% of workers in businesses that are likely to stay open during this crisis are receiving paid sick leave benefits as a result of the second coronavirus relief package."

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Same little boy died of COVID-19 in three different countries. Still don’t believe the media is #fakenews?”

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “‘Private’ messages sent to individual people during a Zoom meeting show up in the end-of-meeting transcript along with all other public messages.”

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says a photo shows South Carolina after stay-at-home orders were announced.

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Robin Vos wore protective gear that “election workers he forced to work … do not have.”

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2020 in a meeting:
quote_txt: "This particular pandemic is one where I don’t think nationwide, there’s been a single fatality under 25."

description_txt: stated on April 3, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says fluid milk production limitations mean grocery stores are short on milk even as farmers are dumping it

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in a press briefing:
quote_txt: With voting by mail, “you get thousands and thousands of people sitting in somebody's living room, signing ballots all over the place.”

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in an image:
quote_txt: Says Donald Trump "himself has a financial stake in the French company that makes the brand-name version of hydroxychloroquine.”

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “The CDC issued its first warning on Jan 8. Trump held campaign rallies on Jan 9, Jan 14, Jan 28, Jan 30, Feb 10, Feb 19, Feb 20, Feb 21, & Feb 28. He golfed on Jan 18, Jan 19, Feb 1, Feb 15, Mar 7, Mar 8. The first time he admitted the coronavirus might be a problem was Mar 13.”

description_txt: stated on March 24, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says a pandemic occurs exactly every 100 years.

description_txt: stated on March 18, 2020 in an Instagram post:
quote_txt: Says “Bill Gates and other globalists, in collaboration with pharmaceutical companies, are reportedly working to push tracking bracelets and ‘invisible tattoos’ to monitor Americans during an impending lockdown.”

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Conservative Supreme Court Justices vote remotely to deny Wisconsin voters their right to vote remotely.”

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in an interview:
quote_txt: Says a powder has been developed that, when mixed with water, “is being used in Germany as a mist. Health care workers go through a misting tent going into the hospital and it kills the coronavirus completely dead not only right then, but any time in the next 14 days that the virus touches anything that’s been sprayed, it is killed.”
